nodes.text: A longblaster was a type of blaster rifle manufactured for high precision and power over long ranges. The Valken-38x, the E-5s sniper rifle, the DLT-20A blaster rifle, the DLT-19x targeting blaster, the A-180 blaster in sniper rifle configuration, the DLT-19D heavy blaster rifle, and the NT-242, were considered longblasters.
